channel.title: Salisbury City Church Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Simon Redmill & Others
channel.generator: hyAD v3 Content Management System - www.hypermouse.co.uk
channel.itunes:subtitle: Inspirational preaching from Simon Redmill & Others
channel.description: Download messages given at Salisbury City Church. Salisbury City Church is a young, vibrant church, with a vision to make a difference in the heart of Salisbury and surrounding area. Salisbury City Church is part of the Newfrontiers family of churches.
channel.itunes:summary: Download messages given at Salisbury City Church. Salisbury City Church is a young, vibrant church, with a vision to make a difference in the heart of Salisbury and surrounding area. Salisbury City Church is part of the Newfrontiers family of churches.
channel.itunes:keywords: Christianity, church, preaching, preach, jesus, christ, message, sermon, sermons, teaching, bible, message, biblical, evangelical, charasmatic, spirit filled
